actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to protect the domestic fishing industry by granting to it the same protections granted to the coastwise trade.

summary.text: Revises the Shipping Act of 1916 to extend coverage under such Act to the domestic fishing industry of the United States. Provides that no vessel owned by a corporation shall be documented to engage in the American fisheries unless such vessel is owned by corporate citizens as defined in the Shipping Act of 1916.

titles.title: A bill to protect the domestic fishing industry by granting to it the same protections granted to the coastwise trade.
